PersonalStatement.text: Valerie Patterson, born on 1986-03-12, is a Male based in Michaelside, Liechtenstein. He is Single and holds Moroccan nationality. Currently working at Adams-Silva.

WorkExperience.text: Software Developer at Estes, Anderson and Warren from 2014 to 2020.
Senior Software Developer at Adams-Silva, 2023 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Marketing from Deakin University
Master's in Engineering from Rice University

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys photography.
